The photograph was determined to be digi: Obeastity 5" Photoshop contest on the website Design Crowd (formerly Worth1000.com).
The: Obeastity 5" contest specifically challenged participants to create images of animals with exaggerated girth, either by making a normal-sized or skinny animal fat or by making an already fat animal even fatter.
